processors.name: kilosort3
processors.description: Kilosort3 is a spike sorting software package developed by Marius Pachitariu at Janelia Research Campus.
processors.label: Kilosort 3

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.description: Path to the electrical series in the NWB file, e.g., /acquisition/ElectricalSeries

parameters.name: detect_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold for spike detection

parameters.name: projection_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold on projections

parameters.name: preclust_threshold
parameters.description: Threshold crossings for pre-clustering (in PCA projection space)

parameters.name: car
parameters.description: Enable or disable common reference

parameters.name: minFR
parameters.description: Minimum spike rate (Hz), if a cluster falls below this for too long it gets removed

parameters.name: minfr_goodchannels
parameters.description: Minimum firing rate on a "good" channel

parameters.name: nblocks
parameters.description: blocks for registration. 0 turns it off, 1 does rigid registration. Replaces "datashift" option.

parameters.name: sig
parameters.description: spatial smoothness constant for registration

parameters.name: freq_min
parameters.description: High-pass filter cutoff frequency

parameters.name: sigmaMask
parameters.description: Spatial constant in um for computing residual variance of spike

parameters.name: nPCs
parameters.description: Number of PCA dimensions

parameters.name: ntbuff
parameters.description: Samples of symmetrical buffer for whitening and spike detection

parameters.name: nfilt_factor
parameters.description: Max number of clusters per good channel (even temporary ones) 4

parameters.name: do_correction
parameters.description: If True drift registration is applied

parameters.name: NT
parameters.description: Batch size (if -1 it is automatically computed)

parameters.name: AUCsplit
parameters.description: Threshold on the area under the curve (AUC) criterion for performing a split in the final step

parameters.name: wave_length
parameters.description: size of the waveform extracted around each detected peak, (Default 61, maximum 81)

parameters.name: keep_good_only
parameters.description: If True only "good" units are returned

parameters.name: skip_kilosort_preprocessing
parameters.description: Can optionally skip the internal kilosort preprocessing

parameters.name: scaleproc
parameters.description: int16 scaling of whitened data, if -1 set to 200.

parameters.name: test_duration_sec
parameters.description: For testing purposes: duration of the recording in seconds (0 means all)
